Performer:
Tsuruzawa Enjirō (鶴澤燕二郎)

Alternate Name: Tsuruzawa Enza VI (鶴澤燕三 (六))

Dates: '1979-'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
